infos.title: Ancient Lich
infos.characteristics: Upon taking M.DMG, reflects M.DMG and silences the aggressor. Physical heroes and CC Resistance stats are advantageous in this stage.

1.name: Mana Shield
1.description: Create a shield that constantly absorbs enemy mana every sec.

2.name: Ray of Darkness
2.description: Fires an energy beam that deals M.DMG to enemies in a straight line and knocks them away.

3.name: Mana Tempest
3.description: Deals M.DMG to a random enemy and inflict knock down for 2 sec.

4.name: Destroyer of Magic
4.description: Every time this monster takes M.DMG, silence said enemy for 1 sec as well as deal M.DMG.

5.name: Purify
5.description: Every 30 sec, remove all negative effects and increase ATK SPD.
